listitem.para: Buddylist is aligned on the left.

The rest of the screen is split into MxN grid for conversation windows.
M = split-h in ~/.gntrc:[irssi]
N = split-v in ~/.gntrc:[irssi]

detaileddescription.para:
Press alt-shift-k/j/l/h to move the selected window to the frame above/below/left/right of the current frame.
All the other windows are always centered.

memberdef.argsstring: (Irssi *irssi, int hor, int vert, int *x, int *y, int *w, int *h)
memberdef.name: get_xywh_for_frame

memberdef.argsstring: (GntWM *wm, GntWidget *win, int x, int y, int w, int h)
memberdef.name: remove_border_set_position_size
